findNew.title: Find someone like you
findNew.descriptionTitle: Find someone who shares your interests, values, and goals. Our matching algorithm will help you find your perfect match.
findNew.formValidationDescriptionLength: The description must contain at least 10 characters.
findNew.activeResponseWarning: You already have an active response in the category:
findNew.alert_can_cancel: You can cancel the active response.
findNew.closeInfo: *Click outside this window if you want to close it.

Addictions: I am addicted to Social Media
I am addicted to Computer Games
Complexes: I have a facial appearance complex
I have a body image complex
I have a social skills complex
Loneliness: I have no one to talk to
I don't feel supported by my family
I don't have a close person
Lack of acceptance in peer group
Lack of acceptance in professional group
Sexual Orientation Issues: I don't know who I am
I'm afraid of being rejected by my family
I am gay, I would like to talk to another gay person
I am lesbian, I would like to talk to another lesbian
Violence: I am a victim of violence at school
I am a victim of physical violence
I am a victim of psychological violence
I am a victim of family violence
I am a victim of economic violence
I am a victim of sexual violence
Depression: I can't enjoy things that used to make me happy
Anxieties: I'm afraid of the death of a loved one
I'm afraid of losing my job
I'm afraid of losing my home

login.enter_details: Enter your details to join the conversation and reconnect with people who understand.

register.name_too_short: Username must be at least 3 characters long
register.password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters long
register.password_too_weak: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, and one number

first.title: Find Support, Share Strength
first.description: Connect with people who understand your struggles and grow together

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Life's challenges can feel overwhelming, especially when it seems like no one else understands what you're going through.

0.text: Struggling with addiction, loneliness, or illness can

1.text_after: or who truly understands their pain

2.text: Lack of support can make it hard to find hope or

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: You're not alone. There are millions of people out there facing similar battles.

0.text_after: , whether it's addiction, mental health, or chronic illness

2.text: Build connections that empower you to

headline.title: How It Works?
headline.description: Connecting with others on FindAlike.Me is simple and secure. Here's how it works.

1.title: Create a Free Account
1.description: Sign up for free and create your profile.

2.title: Find Your Match
2.description: Search and connect with like-minded individuals.

3.title: Start the Conversation
3.description: Engage in meaningful conversations and build connections.

support.title: Support Our Mission
support.description: We believe everyone deserves a supportive community, regardless of their circumstances. Your contribution helps us maintain and grow FindAlike.Me, offering a safe, anonymous platform for those who need it most. Any amount helps.

cta_section.description: You don't have to face your challenges alone. Join FindAlike.Me and connect with people who understand. Your next conversation could make all the difference.
